entry.title: Tahoe Tack Patriotic American Flag Tack Set with Matching Headstall, Reins, and Breastcollar Full Size
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Tack Sets
Price: 116.95

Show off your American pride with this stunning American flag tack set. These sets are a stunning mixture of supple Mahogany, premium, drum-dyed leather with intricately hand-painted American flag detailing.

This set is sure to be a hit in the show ring, or at contests, rodeos, parades, or even just on the trail. This set is sized for the average horse (900-1300lbs).
 
Features:
Hand Painted American Flag Detailing
Silver Sunspot Accents


Included Components: Matching Leather Patriotic Headstall, Breast Collar, and Patriotic 7' Split Reins.

 

Size: Full Horse (average)

entry.title: Pony Nylon Bling Headstall, Rein, and Breast Collar Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Tack Sets
Price: 48.95

Pony size bling headstall and breast collar set. This headstall and breast collar set features 2 ply nylon with black overlay accented with silver studs and crystal rhinestones. on browband, cheeks and chest plates. Adjustable cheeks with hook and loop ends. Breast collar is lined with soft neoprene. Headstall comes with matching nylon hook and loop split reins. Pony Size.

Headstall adjusts 13" to 16" crown to bit loop. Breast collar measures 13.5" from center ring to top ring and is 1.75" wide. Reins are 5/8" x7'.

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Patriotic Silver Star Concho Leather Western Headstall, Breast collar, and Reins Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Tack Sets
Price: 79.95 - 84.95 (7 variants)

Tahoe Tack’s “Jewel of the West” collection was designed to dazzle in the show ring and is composed of only the most beautiful headstalls which are adorned with hand-tooled accents, conchos, show spots, crystals, and many other elegant features. These headstalls exemplify the beauty of fine western tack and are meant to highlight your horse’s features and allow you to stand out in the show ring.

  • QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - this tack set was designed by Tahoe Tack, a fine maker of quality western tack for over 20 years. It features durable hardware and high-quality leather that is designed to last many years with proper care.
  • AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE SIZES AND COLORS - this headstall, rein, and breastcollar set is available in Cob/Arab, Full Horse, and Draft sizing, and in the colors Black and Dark Oil.
  • SILVER STAR CONCHOS - this tack set is adorned with silver star conchos on the browband and cheekpieces of the headstall, along with the breastcollar, and on the reins.
  • PERFECT FOR PARADES - this patriotic set is perfect for parades, events, competitions, or shows due to the classic and attractive star concho design along the headstall, breastcollar, and reins.
  • CHICAGO SCREW STYLE - this tack set features classic Chicago screw style ends, which makes adding or switching bits out as easy as can be.

Cob/Arab (750-1000lbs)

Bit-to-Bit: 34"-42"
Browband: 16"
Breast collar shoulder piece: 15"

 

Full Horse (900-1250lbs)

Bit-to-Bit:: 40"-48"
Browband: 16"
Breast collar shoulder piece: 16"
Draft:
Bit-to-Bit:: 41"-49"
Browband: 17"
Breast collar shoulder piece on LARGEST adjustment: 31"

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Basket Weave Leather Overlay Nylon Headstall, Breast Collar, and Reins Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Tack Sets
Price: 39.95

Tahoe Tack has been making beautiful and high-quality western tack sets for over 20 years. Their tack sets feature a mix of high-quality, durable, traditional designs and elegant features that are available in every style, color, or pattern, designed to suit all riders.

  • QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - this tack set was designed by Tahoe Tack, a fine maker of quality western tack for over 20 years. It features durable hardware and high-quality leather that is designed to last many years with proper care.
  • USA LEATHER - this tack set features leather overlays made of high-grade American leather from Wickett and Craig of Pennsylvania, and is extraordinarily supple, soft, and long-lasting.
  • HORSE SIZE AVAILABLE - this tack set is available in Full Horse sizing to accommodate most average sized equines.
  • PADDED FOR YOUR HORSE’S COMFORT -  this set features light and soft padding on the breast collar and headstall to prevent rubs or irritation to your horse’s coat, and promote a comfortable fit.
  • STAINLESS STEEL HARDWARE - this tack set features high-quality stainless steel hardware that will not rust or tarnish, and remain beautiful for years to come.

    Detailed Product Information

    Collection: Nylon

    Material: Double-Layered Nylon

    Nylon Color: Brown

    Leather Color: London Tan

    Leather Type: American Leather

    Type: Breast Collar

    Hand-Tooling: Yes

    Tooling Type: Basket Weave

    Hardware Type: Stainless Steel

    Rustproof Hardware: Yes

    Inlay: None

    Spotting: None


    Sizing

    Full Horse: 900-1250lbs

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Hand-Inlaid Pink Swarovski Crystal Western Headstall and Breast Collar Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Tack Sets
Price: 87.95 - 119.95 (5 variants)

Tahoe Tack has been making beautiful and high-quality western tack for over 20 years. Their headstalls and breast collars feature a mix of high-quality, durable, traditional designs and elegant features that are available in every style, color, or pattern, designed to suit all riders.

  • QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - this tack set was designed by Tahoe Tack, a fine maker of quality western tack for over 20 years. It features durable hardware and high-quality leather that is designed to last many years with proper care.
  • MULTIPLE COLORS - this tack set is available in the leather colors Black and Light Tan.
  • AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE SIZES - this tack set is available in Mini Horse, Pony, and Full Horse sizing, to fit equines large or small.
  • USA LEATHER - this tack set is made with high-grade American leather from Wickett and Craig of Pennsylvania, and is extraordinarily supple, soft, and long-lasting.
  • STAINLESS STEEL HARDWARE - this tack set features high-quality stainless steel hardware that will not rust or tarnish, and remain beautiful for years to come.

Pink Swarovski Collection

Tahoe Tack's Pink Swarovski collection features real hand-inlaid pink Swarovski crystals on every tack piece, combined with high-grade American leather, stainless steel hardware, and other premium quality features that make for beautiful, elegant, and long-lasting tack.

 

Detailed Product Information

Collection: Pink Swarovski

Material: Double-Layered Leather

Leather Color: London Tan, Black

Leather Type: Bridle Leather

Type: breast collar

Hand-Tooling: No

Tooling Type: N/A

Hardware Type: Stainless Steel

Rustproof Hardware: Yes

Inlay: Swarovski Crystal

Spotting: Show Spotting

 

Sizing

Mini Horse: 150-300lbs

Pony: 500-800lbs

Full Horse: 900-1250lbs

Tahoe Tack has been making beautiful and high-quality western tack sets for over 20 years. Their tack sets feature a mix of high-quality, durable, traditional designs and elegant features that are available in every style, color, or pattern, designed to suit all riders.


Pony:

  • QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - this tack set was designed by Tahoe Tack, a fine maker of quality western tack for over 20 years. It features durable hardware and high-quality nylon that is designed to last many years with proper care.
  • MULTIPLE SIZES AVAILABLE - this tack set is available in Pony, Cob/Arab, Full Horse, and Draft sizing to accommodate most equines large or small.
  • STAINLESS STEEL HARDWARE - this tack set features high-quality stainless steel hardware that will not rust or tarnish, and remain beautiful for years to come.
  • PATRIOTIC DESIGN - show off your love for your country with this gorgeous nylon tack set! This set features a bold combination of red, white, and blue to match the colors of the American flag.
  • PERFECT FOR COMPETITIONS - this attractive set is perfect for competitions, events like rodeos, parades, or for everyday use at the barn or on the trails!
